name: The Boar Princess
title: The Boar Princess
desc: In ancient legends, the Boar Kingdom was prosperous and filled with joy. The young princess of the Kingdom took the wise Fox and long-lived Tortoise, and set out on the road to the north, hoping to turn the little wolf back into that good child...

skills.desc:
Each time you discard 1 Equipment Card from one of your characters during this Round: Gain 1 Omni Element. (Max 2)
(This effect can be triggered by the loss of an Equipment Card from a character falling or from having their Weapon, Artifact, or Technique replaced.)
